sentence: Where do americans buy their groceries in afghanistan? at the infideli counter.
explanation: A person who does not believe in a particular religion or set of beliefs.
first_new_sentence: Many religious texts have referred to those who do not share the faith as infidels.
second_new_sentence: The explorer was often viewed as an infidel in the eyes of the local tribes.
